lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics exercised the options on their newly acquired point guard, Sebastian Telfair, and three other players yesterday, then signed the undrafted free agent Allan Ray of Villanova. Telfair, forward Al Jefferson and guards Delonte West and Gerald Green, will remain under contract through the 2007-8 season. Ray was the No. 6 career scorer at Villanova, averaging 15.4 points.
